0000010010001001 1001100100111010 1 -> sum: 1001110111000100, cout: 0
0011110000000001 0001110101000101 1 -> sum: 0101100101000111, cout: 0
0111110110010001 0011000000110000 0 -> sum: 1010110111000001, cout: 0
0000011100001101 0100110110101101 0 -> sum: 0101010010111010, cout: 0
0110001100100001 0100000111010000 0 -> sum: 1010010011110001, cout: 0
1000110010110011 1111101011110001 0 -> sum: 1000011110100100, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0000000000000000 0000000000000001 0 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 0
0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
